trans-unit.source: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera i tipi di eventi di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesis engines define the types of events submitted to the Speech platform synthesizer infrastructure with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: Moduli di sintesi vocale personalizzato definiscono i tipi di eventi inviati all'infrastruttura di sintetizzatore vocale piattaforma con il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: Specification is performed by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instances passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the class implementing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a custom speech engine's implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica viene eseguita impostando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanze passato al <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> membro di classe che implementa il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaccia passata al <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> metodo in un motore di riconoscimento vocale personalizzato implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure indicates the type of events it is currently handling through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passed to the speak implementation.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura della piattaforma vocale indica il tipo di eventi attualmente gestito tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passato all'implementazione speak.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> is a bitmask, where the members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> define the location of the bit corresponding to the event type.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> una maschera di bit, in cui i membri di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> definire la posizione del bit corrispondente al tipo di evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, WordBoundary has a value of five (5), meaning the fifth bit in the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indicates if the site supports the event type.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, WordBoundary ha un valore pari a cinque (5), vale a dire il quinto bit nel valore restituito da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indica se il sito supporta il tipo di evento.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> istanza <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the WordBoundary event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfacce fornite per l'implementazione supportano il tipo di evento WordBoundary, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> istanza viene utilizzata per creare un evento viene creato un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore unità.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale completa una modifica del livello dell'audio durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale rileva un segnalibro durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale rileva la fine del relativo flusso di input durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale completa un fonema durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale completa una frase durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale inizia a pronunciare un flusso.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale completa un viseme durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale rileva una modifica della voce durante la pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica gli eventi generati quando un motore di sintesi vocale completa una parola durante la pronuncia.
